mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Jennie Howard to Dr. Thomas H. Howard Postmarked September 6, 1867
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter from Jennie Howard of Campbellton Georgia to Dr. Thomas Henry Howard of Floyd County Virginia, postmarked September 6, 1867. Within Jennie expresses excitement that Dr. Howard has said he will be coming to visit. She gives general updates about the family, sharing that Brother Tom is back from helping Uncle Henry, and her daughter Lillie's health is improving.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Doctors
Family
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
